posts.post_content: "Creature - Ouphe"?! Alas, my dreams of constructing a Niall-Silvain tribal deck have been dashed!
posts.html:
"Creature - Ouphe"?! Alas, my dreams of constructing a Niall-Silvain tribal deck have been dashed!
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Kirbster (6/27/2010 2:53:23 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
There are lots of problems with this card in my opinion. Its ability is way to expensive, considering that there are much cheaper ways of doing the same thing. For its Mana cost it should be bigger than it is, probably a 2/3 at least. The card is also extremely green heavy. This is fine considering that green mana is usually easy to come by, but it is useless in any multicolored decks.   
  
Despite all of this I think it deserves a 2/5. Why? The artwork is quite simply awesome.
posts.html:

For its Mana cost it should be bigger than it is, probably a 2/3 at least. The card is also extremely green heavy. This is fine considering that green mana is usually easy to come by, but it is useless in any multicolored decks.

Despite all of this I think it deserves a 2/5. Why? The artwork is quite simply awesome.
